data.Name: The OBGMs
data.Bio: The OBGMs are a black-fronted punk rock band from Toronto that demands your attention. From their genre-fusing music, to their lyrical creativity, the band sound brings a spicy raucous to the palette of your eardrums. Since their inception in 2009, they have released two full length albums, 2020's "The Ends" and a self-titled album in 2017. If there’s something crucial beyond the music, it’s that the OBGMs—Densil McFarlane on vocals and guitar, Colanthony Humphrey on drums and bassist Joseph Brosnan—aren’t your typical rock band. Read more on Last.fm
